name: Texas A&M University Student Chapter - Soil and Water Conservation Society
description: The main objective of this organization shall be the development and advancement of the science and art of good land use and management and the promotion of the conservation of soil, water,air, and related renewable natural resources, including, without limitation, trees, grass, fish, wildlife, and all forms of beneficial plant and animal life, and for these purposes to employ education of the people and other appropriate means, to the end that mankind may have the use and enjoyment of these resources forever. The society will also promote a more conducive relationship between the University and the local community, to establish beneficial relationships among students of colleges in the area with this chapter, and to expand appreciation for the subject matter of conservation on the Texas A&M University campus.
